title: Drawing, "Botanical Studies from Jamaica, West Indies", 1865
medium: Oil, graphite on thin off white paperboard
provenance: Gift of the artist's son, Louis P. Church, in 1917 to the Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration
dimensions: Height 28.9 x Width 25.4 cm (11 3/8 x 10 in. )
description: The lower portion of a tree on which ferns and philodendrons grow is presented surrounded by other plants and bushes at left and right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Botanical Studies from Jamaica, West Indies", 1865.
1865. Oil, graphite on thin off white paperboard. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-393-a.
